name: MINICooperRules
0:
”Alexa. ask MINI Rules to tell me a MINI rule”
”Alexa. ask MINI Rules to tell me a rule”
”Alexa. ask MINI Rules to give me a rule”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mini rules
des:
A skill to list give a random rule from the 10 Rules of MINI Ownership. The Rules are:
#1. Always Park next to a MINI
'#2. Wave to other MINIs
#3 Take your MINI to meet other MINIs. KInd of like taking a dog to the dog park. They need socilaization.
#4. Wave at other MINIs
#5. Stickers = Horsepower.
#6. Wave!
#7. Find friends to help you mod your MINI.
#8. Please wave back!
#9. Be unique. No two MINIs should be alike
'#10. Finally, Wave back or sell it and get a Fiat or some other boring car!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
